subject: I have a lucrative business
body:
I have a lucrative business proposal to discuss with you via email. Anticipating your response If you would please oblige me the opportunity, I shall provide you with details upon your response.
Anticipating your response
Best regards,
Huston Eden

subject: Re:   I have a lucrative business
body:
Hello Huston Eden,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm always interested in hearing about new business proposals. Could you please provide more details about this opportunity? 

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Richard

subject: DETAILS.
body:
Dear Mr Richard,

Thanks for responding to my proposal, so I am freely giving you the full
details of this transaction which is a sum of $15million USD for your
understanding, bearing in mind that you will not betray me, please I am a
very honest man and I will trust you wholeheartedly.. My name is  Mr Huston
Eden, I am located in Dubai , UAE.  The name of the bank I work for is
Emirates Bank Group and presently I am with the Human Resources department,
I will also wish to invest some part of my share into profitable venture's
in your country,i can't involve myself in illegality because of my
personality.


This transaction requires utmost trust and dedication from your side, since
you will be receiving the funds as the Next of Kin/ Heir to Mr Mehmet and
shall be in control of the funds, until I come over for my share. Regarding
the sharing, I am under the belief that my sharing ratio is accepted to
you, 50/50% is a fair deal. I want you to bear one thing in mind, there is
no risk involved in this transaction.

It is 100% risk free and secured once you follow my instructions and keep
everything secret between us. What I have to do is just to place your
information in my bank system as the Next of Kin/ Heir to late Mr Mehmet
and I will apply for the claim on your behalf as the accounts officer to
the deceased here in the U.A.E.  As an Auditing Officer now at the Human
Resources dept of my bank, the secret of the bank system is in my hands,
placing your details in our bank's central database as the Next of Kin/
Heir to late Mehmet is an easy task for me.


Once again, I assure you that there is no risk involved; the transaction
will be executed under a legitimate arrangement that will protect both of
us from any breach of law.  I will present you as a relation to Mehmet and
the only proof the bank will need is your identification, where your names
are written. This is a very smooth operation, with me in the bank it will
not last more than 2 weeks and the funds will be released to you.

The information I require to commence the process is as follows;

YOUR FULL NAMES,MARITAL STATUS,COPY OF YOUR INTERNATIONAL PASSPORT,
OCCUPATION, ADDRESS AND TELEPHONE NUMBER.

Once I receive the above-mentioned information and conclude with my inside
arrangements and changes, by backdating your information to reflect
accordingly with the time of original clients supposedly registered next of
kin.

Please, remember to treat this transaction with utmost confidentiality for
our own good. I await your urgent response.


I have an interest in investing most part of my share into the real estate
business.
Regards,

Mr Huston Eden
